name: Asthma
description: A respiratory condition causing difficulty in breathing due to inflamed airways.

name: Anemia
description: A condition where the blood lacks enough healthy red blood cells, leading to fatigue and weakness.

name: Common Cold
description: A viral infection of the nose and throat causing a runny nose, sneezing, and cough.

name: Flu (Influenza)
description: A contagious respiratory illness caused by influenza viruses.

name: Sinusitis
description: Inflammation of the sinuses causing headaches and nasal congestion.

name: Tonsillitis
description: Inflammation of the tonsils, often leading to sore throat and fever.

name: Bronchitis
description: Inflammation of the bronchial tubes leading to cough and mucus production.

name: Gastroenteritis
description: An intestinal infection causing diarrhea, cramps, nausea, and vomiting.

name: Ear Infection
description: An infection in the ear, often causing pain and fever.

name: Strep Throat
description: A bacterial infection that causes sore throat and fever.

name: Conjunctivitis (Pink Eye)
description: Inflammation of the conjunctiva, leading to redness and discharge from the eye.

name: Food Poisoning
description: Illness caused by consuming contaminated food, leading to nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea.

name: Allergic Rhinitis
description: An allergic reaction causing sneezing, runny nose, and itchy eyes.

name: Sprains
description: Injury to ligaments caused by stretching or tearing, often occurring in the ankle or wrist.

name: Migraine
description: A severe headache often accompanied by nausea, vomiting, and sensitivity to light.

name: Chickenpox
description: A highly contagious viral infection causing an itchy rash and red spots.

name: Fungal Skin Infection
description: Infections like athlete's foot or ringworm caused by fungi on the skin.

name: UTI (Urinary Tract Infection)
description: An infection in the urinary system, causing pain and frequent urination.

name: Cystitis
description: Inflammation of the bladder, often causing pain and a burning sensation during urination.

name: Hives
description: An outbreak of swollen, pale red bumps or plaques on the skin due to an allergic reaction.

name: RSV (Respiratory Syncytial Virus)
description: A virus that causes respiratory infections, particularly in infants and young children.

name: Otitis Media
description: Middle ear infection causing earache, fever, and trouble hearing.

name: Impetigo
description: A contagious skin infection that causes red sores, usually on the face.

name: Scabies
description: A skin infestation caused by tiny mites, leading to itching and rash.

name: Laryngitis
description: Inflammation of the larynx causing a hoarse voice and sore throat.

name: Stomach Ulcer
description: A sore that develops on the lining of the stomach, causing pain and indigestion.

name: Dehydration
description: A condition caused by the excessive loss of body fluids, leading to weakness and dizziness.

name: Bacterial Vaginosis
description: An infection caused by an imbalance of bacteria in the vagina.

name: Shingles
description: A viral infection causing a painful rash, usually on one side of the body.

name: Cold Sores
description: Small blisters around the mouth caused by the herpes simplex virus.

name: Hand, Foot, and Mouth Disease
description: A viral illness causing sores in the mouth and rashes on the hands and feet.

name: Hemorrhoids
description: Swollen veins in the rectum or anus causing discomfort and bleeding.

name: Diarrhea
description: Frequent loose or watery bowel movements, often caused by infections or food intolerance.

name: Constipation
description: Difficulty in passing stools, often accompanied by abdominal pain.

name: Eczema
description: A condition causing itchy, red, and inflamed skin.

name: Dermatitis
description: Inflammation of the skin, leading to red, itchy rashes.

name: Psoriasis
description: A skin disorder that causes red, scaly patches on the skin.

name: Bursitis
description: Inflammation of the bursa, causing pain in joints such as the shoulder or hip.

name: Tendonitis
description: Inflammation of a tendon, often caused by overuse or injury.

name: Sinus Headache
description: A headache caused by inflamed sinuses, leading to pressure and pain in the face.

name: Boils
description: A painful, pus-filled bump caused by bacterial infection of a hair follicle.

name: Vertigo
description: A sensation of spinning or dizziness, often caused by inner ear problems.

name: Dandruff
description: A condition causing flaking of the scalp, often accompanied by itching.

name: Chilblains
description: Painful, itchy swellings on the skin due to exposure to cold temperatures.

name: Heat Rash
description: A skin irritation caused by excessive sweating in hot and humid conditions.

name: Sore Throat
description: Pain or irritation in the throat, often due to viral or bacterial infections.

name: Ingrown Toenail
description: A condition where the edge of the toenail grows into the surrounding skin, causing pain and swelling.

name: Blisters
description: Fluid-filled pockets on the skin, often caused by friction or burns.

name: Jock Itch
description: A fungal infection in the groin area causing itching and redness.
